short_description: 4-ounce tube of Tylenol Precise Warming Pain Reliever Cream with Maximum Strength Lidocaine for targeted, penetrating pain relief
Warming pain relief cream targets pain receptor nerves to block pain signals. The topical pain cream provides penetrating pain relief and numbs away minor joint and muscle pain
The fast acting cream with a warming sensation can be used to provide relief from aches and pains in the back and shoulders, legs and hips, knees, elbows and ankles, and other small joints

The topical analgesic contains maximum strength 4% lidocaine without a prescription for pain relief. The fast-absorbing, non-sticky cream leaves no residue and provides a warming sensation to help minor joint and muscle pain

The lightly scented topical pain reliver cream includes a mess-free, massaging rollerball applicator for precise application. Adults and children 12 years and older, use only as directed. Apply to affected area no more than 3 to 4 times daily
product_description: Tylenol Precise Warming Pain Relieving Cream provides warming, penetrating pain relief to help numb minor joint and muscle soreness. Formulated with maximum strength 4% lidocaine without a prescription, this pain relieving cream targets pain receptor nerves to block pain signals and provide warming relief from muscle aches and pains you can feel quickly. It's ideal for use in the back and shoulders, legs and hips, knees, elbows and ankles, and other small joints. The fast-absorbing, non-sticky cream is lightly scented and won't leave any residue behind on skin or clothes. For easy, mess-free application, the topical analgesic includes a massaging rollerball applicator. To use, adults and children 12 and older should apply the pain relief cream to affected areas no more than three to four times daily.

name: AneCream 4% Lidocaine Cream - Topical Lidocaine Numbing Cream - Over-The-Counter Topical Numbing Cream for Itching, Minor Cuts & Scrapes, Bug Bite & Minor Sunburn (0.5 oz/ 15 g)
short_description: FAST ACTING 4% LIDOCAINE CREAM – AneCream is a non-greasy over-the-counter topical lidocaine cream specially formulated with soothing agents. Designed for anesthetic use on normal intact skin to relieve itching and minor cuts and scrapes, its provides relief that lasts for ~ 60 minutes.

OTC PAIN RELIEF CREAM – It is your essential OTC pain reliever, perfect for every household's first-aid kit. Keep it within reach whether you're on a cruise ship, in your apartment, dorm room, or even on the road with a first aid kit for your car, it is a must-have in your essentials. It is ideal for travel kits and mini purse essentials, ensuring you're always prepared.

COOLING – Feel the instant cooling effect of AneCream topical numbing cream, whether it’s a bug bite or a long day in the sun, AneCream is known to have a calming effect on the skin that helps reduce itchiness and inflammation.
ANTI-ITCHING – Don't let bug bites ruin your day. AneCream, fortified with 4 % Lidocaine, offers fast-acting calming relief, ensuring you can enjoy your time outdoors without discomfort.

CHILD-PROOF – AneCream 4% lidocaine numbing cream comes equipped with a child-proof lid. No worries about the kiddos getting into any shenanigans because the child-resistant cap keeps ‘em out. Keep your home safe and secure with this added layer of protection.

SPORTS ESSENTIAL PERFORMANCE AID – AneCream´s lidocaine cream is an essential companion for athletes, designed to provide fast-acting ease for sore body tissue, minor injuries, & irritations using its powerful 4% lidocaine blend. Its non-greasy, easy-to-apply texture ensures you apply it exactly where needed. Compact & portable, this lidocaine cream for pain fits everywhere, making it easy to carry wherever you go, hitting the gym, playing on the field, or traveling for competitions,

name: WELMATE 5% Lidocaine Hemorrhoid Relief Cream, Maximum Strength Anorectal Cream, 5.5 oz
short_description: Fast Acting Hemorrhoid Cream - Made with 5% Lidocaine, this topical anesthetic provides temporary relief from discomfort, itching, and burning associated with hemorrhoids and other anorectal irritation.
Maximum Strength Lidocaine Cream - Delivers doctor-recommended strength with the highest percentage of Lidocaine available over the counter to help soothe targeted external discomfort fast.

External Use Only, Made for Sensitive Skin - Formulated for delicate areas, this cream is designed for external, anorectal use and is gentle on all skin types. Packaging is child-resistant for added peace of mind.

How to Use - Clean the area with soap and water, rinse thoroughly, and pat dry. Apply external pain relief cream up to 6 times per day. Our cream is cruelty-free, non-greasy, odorless, and free from harsh chemicals.

Why WELMATE? - Founded in 2020 by former pharmacy employees who were fed up with the pricing of over-the-counter medication. Today, we continue to bring affordable health and wellness products to your doorstep as America's trusted OTC store.

product_description: TheraCare Maximum Strength OTC Lidocaine Cream delivers maximum strength temporary relief from minor aches, pains, and discomfort in muscles and joints—such as arthritis pain, backaches, strains, sprains, and bruises—with 4% lidocaine that desensitizes nerve endings for targeted, fast-acting relief. Its non-greasy, quick-absorbing, and virtually odor-free formula glides onto skin easily, allowing safe application every 6–8 hours up to three times daily without residue or stickiness. Intended for use by adults and children 12 years and older (children under 12 should consult a physician), TheraCare includes clear instructions and warnings to ensure safe use—avoid application to large areas, broken or irritated skin, or use beyond one week without medical advice.

name: Tylenol Precise Cooling Sensation Lidocaine Cream, 4% Lidocaine & 1% Menthol, Maximum OTC Strength Pain Relief for Back, Muscle & Joint, Fast-Acting Numbing Cream with Rollerball Applicator, 4 oz
short_description: Maximum strength numbing relief: 4% lidocaine numbing cream with 1% menthol penetrates to block pain signals at the source; fast-acting cool sensation in under 15 minutes; topical analgesic lidocaine cream is non-greasy, non-sticky and leaves no residue.

Roll on pain relief applicator: Innovative massaging rollerball offers precise, mess-free application for back pain relief and targeted relief on joints, muscles, knees, shoulders and ankles; portable and easy to use on the go.

Cooling sensation formula: Fast-acting menthol delivers instant cool relief to soothe minor joint and muscle pain; light scent enhances comfort; lidocaine cream absorbs quickly without greasiness or stickiness for clean, continuous relief.

Targeted muscle and joint relief: Penetrating lidocaine cream formula for back, shoulder, hip, knee and elbow pain penetrates to numb minor aches; apply to affected area not more than 3-4 times daily as directed for sustained comfort throughout the day.

Non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula: Topical analgesic cream is non-greasy, non-sticky and fast-absorbing for a clean feel; apply a thin layer not more than 3–4 times daily; ideal pain relief roll on for everyday aches and pains on the go.
product_description: Tylenol Precise Cooling Sensation Pain Relief Roll On Cream, with a massaging rollerball applicator, is a maximum strength lidocaine cream roll on topical analgesic that combines 4% lidocaine and 1% menthol to provide fast-acting numbing relief and cooling sensation for minor joint and muscle aches. Designed for precise, mess-free use, the built-in rollerball lets you target common areas like the back and shoulders, legs and hips, knees, elbows, ankles, and other small joints without getting cream on your hands—ideal for at-home care, post-workout aches and pains, and on-the-go back pain relief needs. This non-greasy, non-sticky pain relief cream glides smoothly, has a light, pleasant scent, and is formulated to absorb well for comfortable wear. For best results, use the rollerball to apply a thin, even layer, massage gently, and allow to absorb before dressing or activity to help minimize transfer to clothing. The compact 4-ounce tube fits easily into a gym bag, travel kit, or medicine cabinet, and the roll on format helps you control coverage and pressure for targeted comfort. Adults and children 12 years and older should apply to the affected area not more than 3 to 4 times daily; use only as directed. As a lidocaine and menthol roll on topical analgesic, this pain relief roll on and numbing cream is available over the counter without a prescription and can be used whenever minor aches and pains of muscle and joints appear. Whether you need a cooling sensation for your back after a long day, soothing support for knees and elbows during everyday activities, or quick comfort for small joints, Tylenol Precise Cooling Sensation Pain Relieving Lidocaine Cream with 4% lidocaine and 1% menthol offers targeted, cooling numbing relief you can reach for throughout the day. To maintain a clean, convenient experience, keep the cap secured when not in use.
